Algorithm.name: heuristic
Algorithm.description: The algorithm employed for the abstract propagation. Complete performs exact abstract interpretation, Approximate performs incomplete abstract interpretation and Mixed_N refine N neurons per layer

Refinement heuristic.name: heuristic
Refinement heuristic.description: Branching heuristic to employ in the refinement

Intersection strategy.name: intersection
Intersection strategy.description: Strategy to compute the intersection. bounds_lp is faster, star_lp is more precise

Timeout.name: timeout
Timeout.description: Stop criteria for the algorithm in seconds
